item.title: How to make a starter command need help!
item.dc:creator: @ChemicalReaction1 ChemicalReaction™
item.description:
@ChemicalReaction1 wrote:

I think its this, go to your “Logs” folder, make a .java called “starter”
That will keep the names of people who have got theres. and if there name is in there, they cant get more…
now go to “Client.java” and add this command

[code]}if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
sendMessage(“You already have your starter”);

else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,200000000);
addItem(6583,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1057,1);
addItem(3140,1);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}
[/code]

~Chemical~

Read full topic
